column4: anyone know how to fix my slow pc? :( works fine under XP, dual booting with hardy. runs really slow, screen keeps dipping to grey while it waits for applications
I have an IBM T43 laptop with an Intel 910 chipset. Which would the best graphics driver for me be? I seem to be getting really poor performance with the default driver in hardy.
I have an IBM T43 laptop with an Intel 910 chipset. Which would the best graphics driver for me be? I seem to be getting really poor performance with the default driver in hardy.
it's the integrated Intel 910 chipset video card... it's all on board
